title: Fact magazine cover
content:
Hello, can anyone tell me what's the font used for the word FACT in **fact magazine**?  
I've tried Palatino and Times New Roman, but the 'f' and 't' doesn't seem to match.  
Thanks in advance :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150111231839im_/http:/typophile.com/files/180px-Factgoldwater_4003.jpg)
author: Lawr N
